title: Chapter 4393 - Chapter 4393: 4392 Attacked And Occupied The Starry Universe
body:
Chapter 4393 - Chapter 4393: 4392 Attacked And Occupied The Starry Universe

Chapter 4393: 4392 attacked and occupied the starry universe

“Dragon King, we are in position!”

“Dragon King, we are in position!”

Wang Xian stood in front of the center of the starry universe and waited for the news quietly.

A few days later, news came one after another from Hun Dun and Mo Sha.

Upon seeing this news, he immediately gave the order!

“Attack!”

Buzz

At the same time, Wang Xian’s body moved. He transformed into his divine dragon form and rushed forward.

Roar! Roar! Roar

Roar! Roar

In the ocean ahead, the Beast Emperor sensed Wang Xian’s aura and revealed an expression of shock and anger.

He let out a series of roars. Following that, an extremely terrifying stream of water rushed towards Wang Xian!

This space beast was called the Sea Emperor Beast by Hun Dun and the rest!

It was a ferocious beast emperor that had huge wings but lived in the ocean!

Its body was like an ancient giant crocodile and it had huge wings!

On its body, it carried a meatball that was like a mountain!

It looked extremely terrifying!

However, this time, after the terrifying Neptune Beast sensed Wang Xian’s aura.

After launching the first attack, it didn’t hesitate at all and fled into the distance.

He could feel the threat of death from Wang Xian!

He could feel the aura that made him despair.

“Hehe, you want to escape? Can you escape?”

Wang Xian smiled. He swayed his huge body and his body shook slightly.

The void disk above was emitting a luster. Wang Xian instantly arrived above the Neptune!

His terrifying dragon claws clawed downwards.

Each of his dragon claws contained a terrifying energy.

Under the mixing of ten types of energy, huge wounds appeared on the Sea Emperor Beast’s body instantly!

One strike had injured this sea emperor beast!

This was Wang Xian’s current strength!

An extremely powerful strength!

There was still a huge gap between the chaotic level of a single entity and the chaotic level unleashed by a group of experts!

For example, one chaos level was equivalent to twenty-seven beginner levels!

However, it was very easy to kill all twenty-seven beginner levels when they were fighting against the chaos level.

Unless they had some secret technique that could make the twenty-seven beginner levels attack and defend as one without any flaws.

However, the possibility of this happening was too small!

This Sea Emperor Beast was only at the Great Dao level. When it faced Wang Xian, it had no ability to resist at all!

“Roar! Roar!”

Being attacked by Wang Xian, the Neptune let out a pained cry.

He widened his blood-red eyes and flapped his wings!

“Boom! Boom! Boom!”

The surrounding ocean started to boil. The seawater started to turn red and began to boil. Finally, it turned into a special water droplet with flames.

Countless flaming water droplet covered Wang Xian!

“Petty tricks!”

Wang Xian released a powerful energy from his body. He completely ignored the attack of the Neptune.

“Bang! Bang! Bang!”

Countless flaming water droplets landed on Wang Xian’s body. They were easily blocked and could not break through his defense.

That’s right. At this moment, this level of damage could not break through Wang Xian’s defense at all.

“Boom! Boom!”

“Let’s try the power of the disk of nothingness and the Heaven’s origin Golden Eyes!”

Wang Xian waved his arm and streams of energy entered the disk of nothingness.

Boom! Boom! Boom

In the next instant, these powerful energies landed directly on the body of the Neptune.

Regardless of distance.

In an instant, a large number of wounds appeared on the body of the Neptune once again!

Buzz

At the spot between Wang Xian’s dragon head and brows, the golden eyes emitted a golden glow.

An extremely terrifying golden ray shot towards the Neptune!

“Roar! Roar! Roar!”

The Neptune let out a fearful roar. When it saw the incoming golden ray, it quickly dodged to the distance.

However, when the Neptune dodged, the Golden Ray followed its movements.

As long as the Neptune was within the sight of Wang Xian’s golden eyes, he would not be able to dodge this attack.

He could only take it head-on.

He could only take it head-on, he couldn’t Dodge it!

Thump! Thump! Thump

Muffled sounds rang out.

The terrifying golden rays penetrated the body of the Neptune.

It pierced through a terrifying wound.

However, these wounds weren’t fatal to the Neptune!

“Roar! Roar! Roar!”

The Neptune was terrified. It raised its head and roared. It flapped its gigantic wings.

With the flapping of its wings, violent rain started to fall from the sky!

However, at this moment, Wang Xian realized that the Neptune had started to disintegrate again. Its body turned into droplets of rain and seawater as it fled in all directions!

“A means of escape?”

Wang Xian chuckled when he saw this scene.

“Freeze Everything!”

Wang Xian opened his dragon mouth. Waves of energy were brewing in his body. Following that, streams of frost power were released downwards.

In an instant, everything in the world, except for the Void, was frozen!

“Crack! Crack! Crack!”

“Roar! Roar! Roar!”

A miserable cry sounded in the void once again.

The Neptune used all its strength to resist the terrifying attack and gathered together again.

However, the Neptune looked extremely miserable at this moment!

“The vitality of the space behemoth is indeed abnormal. If it were an ordinary great dao expert, he would have been easily killed by me!”

Wang Xian mumbled!

However, this was going to happen soon!

Boom! Boom! Boom

Wang Xian’s body trembled. Countless flames descended from the sky. The energy in his body circulated and eventually turned into a flaming divine dragon!

The Flames fell and destroyed everything in the surroundings!

The Sea Emperor Beast rolled around in pain. It struggled violently and wanted to escape!

However, the continuous attacks made it impossible for him to use his innate skills.

The life force in his body was also dissipating rapidly.

Buzz

Wang Xian waved his dragon claws. The surrounding ocean churned and formed a huge sphere that surrounded the Neptune and himself.

When the Neptune saw this scene, it was completely terrified.

It began to fight with all its might!

Powerful innate skills attacked Wang Xian without any regard for its life.

However, they were all easily blocked.

The life force in his body was also dissipating rapidly.

Time passed by minute by minute.

After more than ten minutes, the Neptune was already extremely weak.

The Aura on its body was also extremely weak!

“I can die now!”

Wang Xian shook his head. He waved his dragon claws and destructive energy attacked every part of its body.

“Roar! Roar!”

Finally, the Neptune let out a blood-curdling scream. It was completely dead.

In the surrounding area, this huge battle caused all the space beasts in the boundless starry sky to flee in fear.

“Done. I wonder what is the current situation with Devil Fiend and Hun Dun?”

Wang Xian revealed a smile. He kept the body of the Neptune and scanned his surroundings.

As the lair of a Great Dao level space beast, there were still many treasures here.
